on reading compounds: 暮秋【ボシュウ】late autumn (fall), ninth month of the lunar calendar
歳暮【セイボ】year-end gift, end of the year, year end
朝々暮々【チョウチョウボボ】every morning and evening
kun reading compounds: 暮れる【くれる】to get dark, to grow dark, to end (of a day, year, season, etc.), to come to an end, to close, to be sunk in (e.g. despair), to be lost in (e.g. thought), to be overcome with
暮らす【くらす】to live, to get along, to spend (time)
